game.name: Clash of Melodies
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Visual Novel Rhythm Game that tells the story of two dorks who don't like each other going on an adventure together. Play the DDR / FNF inspired Arrow Mode and the original Circle Mode. Enjoy the story or go for a highscore in Freeplay.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Visual Novel Rhythm Game that tells the story of two dorks who don't like each other going on an adventure together. Play the DDR / FNF inspired Arrow Mode and the original Circle Mode. Enjoy the story or go for a highscore in Freeplay.
